Package org.luisa.miniwrangler.java.transform

Interface ITextTransform

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITextTransformConcat, ITextTransformFixedValue, ITextTransformRename
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextTransformConcat, TextTransformFixedValue, TextTransformProperCase, TextTransformRename
    public interface ITextTransform
    Represents a text transformation - Each line in a transformations DSL specification should be converted to an instance of a subclass of this interface
    Author:
    Luisa Pinto

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getTargetField()
      Return the target field for this transformation
      void run​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> srcFieldIndexMap, java.util.List<java.lang.String> data, Facade targetObject)
      Run this transformation, which consists of applying given data to given the target object given a source field index map - if src field 'A' has index 'i', then it assumes the value will be at data[i]

    • Method Detail

      • getTargetField

        java.lang.String getTargetField()
        Return the target field for this transformation
        Returns:
        the target field

      • run

        void run​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> srcFieldIndexMap,
         java.util.List<java.lang.String> data,
         Facade targetObject)
  throws UnknownIndexException,
         UnknownFieldException,
         PatternMismatchException,
         InvalidDataException
        Run this transformation, which consists of applying given data to given the target object given a source field index map - if src field 'A' has index 'i', then it assumes the value will be at data[i]
        Parameters:
        srcFieldIndexMap - source field index map
        data - the data
        targetObject - the target object
        Throws:
        UnknownIndexException - if the source for this transformation does not exist in the srcFieldIndexMap
        UnknownFieldException - if the target field for this transformation does not exist in the target object
        PatternMismatchException - if the pattern specified for the the corresponding data value is not matched
        InvalidDataException - if the data cannot be assigned to the target field of the target object
